item.title: Hands-on the Avi Kubernetes Operator (AKO)
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: A hands on guide which covers the deployment and configuration of the Avi Kubernetes Operator and to ultimately integrate it with the NSX Advanced Load Balancer to make use of the modern and comprehensive features of VMware's Next Gen Load Balancer.

item.title: vSphere 7 with Kubernetes supercharged - Helm, Harbor and Tanzu Kubernetes Grid
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: In this post I will focus on the installation of Harbor using Helm and also on the preperations you have to do upfront before you are able to let the Supervisor Cluster pull images out of Harbor and to subsequently instantiate them as a native Pod on vSphere.
